review.intent: Characterize each model's tool-use strategy, showing how subagent delegation, planning adoption, and effort distribution differ.
focus: Verify subagent type breakdown percentages match behavior-metrics.json
Check that planning adoption claims are still accurate after any data updates
Confirm effort distribution prose correctly characterizes each model's research vs implementation pattern

prose.guidance: This section covers behavioral patterns. Characterize each model's subagent strategy (type distribution, delegation frequency) and how it relates to their overall tool-use approach. Verify subagent and planning claims match the data.
